about_the_game:
Does your fantasy RPG village need a bigger marketplace? This interior tileset for RPG Maker has veggies, baked goods, butcher shop and more, with plenty of tiles to make a variety of small fantasy stores!

The Fantasy Market ~ Grocery Tileset Includes:

Ground tiles:

Cement, flat dirt, cobblestone, 4 colors of wood flooring in 2 directions, 4 colors of rugs (several shapes and styles) and 4 colors of tables, one with wood grain and one without.

Walls/roofs:

Includes woven wall texture, plus two types of wall with wood trim.

Basic shelving is also provided as an autotile. (4 colors, 2 styles)

Also includes:

* Basic interior design elements – fireplaces, windows, plants, stairs, etc
* 4 colors of merchandise displays – includes wall shelves, bins, small stands, wall hooks and more
* Signs
* 16 types of fruits – includes common fruits like apples, bananas and pears, and also more exotic fruits like coconuts and starfruit.
* 18 types of veggies – mushrooms, broccoli, daikon radish, corn, pumpkins and lots more.
* 8 variations are provided for all fruits and vegetables to give more versatility in placement.
* Spices in piles (with scoop)
* Butcher shop – beef, chicken, turkey, fish, seafood, all with variations. Also includes hanging meats for window displays.
* Baked goods – artisan breads, breadsticks, biscuits, doughnuts, pastries, cupcakes, frosted cakes, pies and more. All baked goods have “fully stocked” and
“low stock” variations, with an “out of stock” board with a few crumbs on it.
* Jelly jars (can also be potions) with label
* Honey (3 variations)
* Dairy goods – butter, milk, and 8 cheeses with low-stock variations
* Winery – 8 wine colors, with single bottles, shelved bottles, and bottles in a wall rack. Also includes barrels.
* Grain sacks with plain and brightly colored grains.
* Pots with potions (or whatever you’d like the colored liquid to be)

Events and Animations

Fire animation for fireplaces, doors, barrel/crate opening animation.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
